mapper.select: SELECT * FROM item WHERE id=#{id} AND is_valid = 1 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM item WHERE is_valid = 1 ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITEM (id, register_id, name, img, price, item_size, color, rdate, is_valid) VALUES (item_seq.NEXTVAL, #{registerId}, #{name}, #{img}, #{price}, #{itemSize}, #{color}, SYSTIMESTAMP, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET register_id=#{registerId}, name=#{name}, img=#{img}, price=#{price}, item_size=#{itemSize}, color=#{color}, udate=SYSDATE, is_valid=#{isValid} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE item SET udate=SYSDATE, is_valid = 0 WHERE id=#{id}
